casebody.data:
Clarence MUSE and Mills Music, Inc., Plaintiffs-Appellants, v. Robert MELLIN, Robert Music Corporation, Sherwin Music, Inc. and American Society of Composers, Authors and Publishers, Defendants-Appellees. No. 214, Docket 28156. United States Court of Appeals Second Circuit. Argued Nov. 17, 1964. Decided Dec. 29, 1964. Theodore R. Kupferman, New York City, for plaintiffs-appellants. Jack M. Ginsberg, New York City, for defendants-appellees.

Before LUMBARD, Chief Judge, and MEDINA and MARSHALL, Circuit. Judges.

PER CURIAM:

The judgment below is affirmed on the-authority of T. B. Harms Co. v. Eliscu, 2 Cir., 339 F.2d 823, decided December 23, 1964.

Affirmed.
